summary: Senior Product Manager with deep expertise in **AI-driven solutions** and driving both B2C and B2B products, currently leading GenAI initiatives at Justdial.
Proven track record of driving **product growth and organic traffic** through strategic SEO and data-driven user funnel optimization.
Technical PM capable of bridging the gap between business goals and engineering, with hands-on experience in **LLMs, Model Context Protocols (MCP), and Python**.
Successful history of delivering complex **omnichannel and logistics solutions** for global brands including Swiggy, Nykaa, and Skechers.

experience.role: Sr. Product Manager - AI and Growth Initiatives
experience.description: Leading the AI charter, developing Agentic AI workflows and integrating GenAI capabilities to automate business processes and enhance user experience.
Drove organic traffic and user acquisition through strategic SEO and content initiatives and data-driven UX optimisations.
Managed the B2B marketplace product lifecycle, focusing on end to end buyer funnel.
Designed and delivered new product modules that increased customer retention and lifetime value (LTV) across Order and warehouse management systems.
Delivered change requirements and client-specific customizations by coordinating effectively between project managers and engineering teams.

aiProjects.description: Architected a Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for the App Marketplace, enabling Justdial to allow seamless connectivity with major LLMs like ChatGPT and Claude.

aiProjects.description: Automated translation of Justdial pages into 7 regional languages, driving 5M+ monthly organic traffic.

aiProjects.description: Implemented visual search capabilities allowing users to query local businesses and products using images, enhancing discovery.

aiProjects.description: Deployed an automated voice bot for verifying business listings at scale, ensuring data accuracy while reducing operational costs.

rolesDetails.role: Sr. Product Manager - AI and Growth Initiatives
points: Architecting the **Agentic AI Framework** to automate complex customer support workflows, targeting a 40% reduction in manual query resolution.
Spearheading the integration of **Voice AI** agents for outbound sales, enabling 24/7 lead qualification and appointment scheduling.
Developing a proprietary **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** implementation to allow seamless switching between LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini) for various internal tools.
Leading a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers and data scientists to build and deploy **RAG-based** knowledge retrieval systems for internal staff.
Enriched **2L+ Products** by deploying a pipeline combining **RAG and LLM** outputs, significantly improving content quality and search relevance.
Orchestrated the **SEO Revamp 2.0**, implementing programmatic SEO strategies that increased organic traffic by 150% YoY.
Optimized the **User Acquisition Funnel** through A/B testing on landing pages, resulting in a 25% uplift in signup conversion rates.
Launched **Multilingual Pages** across 7 regional languages, driving **5M+ monthly organic traffic** via automated translation workflows.
Collaborated with marketing to drive **Performance Marketing** efficiency, reducing CAC by 18% through better audience targeting and landing page relevance.
Implemented rigorous **Data Analytics** pipelines using Google Analytics 4 and internal analytics engine to track real-time user behavior impacting retention.
Introduced **non-regional B2B Results pages** and added auto-generated catalogues, seller videos, and dynamic Q&As, resulting in a **100% increase** in results page user visits via Google.
Added **lead generating avenues** on pages contributing to a **50% increase** in click on lead CTAs.
Introduced a new **lead generation channel**, adding monthly revenue of approximately **â‚¹5.6 million**.
Launched **JD Shopping**, an open quick commerce platform empowering local retailers to sell online.
Led the **Omnichannel Inventory Management** module, enabling real-time stock sync across 15+ marketplaces (Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra).
Designed and launched the **'Vin eRetail' Mobile App**, giving warehouse managers on-the-go access to order processing and dashboard metrics.
Optimized **Order Routing Algorithms** to automatically assign orders to the nearest warehouse, reducing shipping costs and delivery times by 20%.
Worked closely with clients like **Skechers and Nykaa** to gather requirements and built custom integrations for their specific logistics workflows.
Conducted extensive **Gap Analysis** for enterprise clients migrating to SaaS-based OMS/WMS solutions.
Documented detailed **BRDs (Business Requirement Documents)** and FSDs, bridging the communication gap between business stakeholders and technical teams.
Facilitated **UAT (User Acceptance Testing)** phases for major deployments, ensuring zero critical bugs upon go-live.
Assisted in the **Pre-sales** process by creating product demos and proof-of-concept workflows for potential enterprise leads.

mantra: Building products that think, not just do.

caseStudy.title: Skechers Omnichannel Implementation
caseStudy.description: Implemented a comprehensive omnichannel strategy reducing order-to-delivery time from 2 weeks to 2 hours. Features included order orchestration, endless aisle, and contactless COVID-safe store fulfillment.
